title: Introduction to Administering Office 365 for Small Business
headline: Learn about the features, requirements, and administration of Office 365 for small businesses and IT professionals.
description: This free online Office 365 for small business course teaches you about administering Office 365 in a small business environment. This course will teach you how to manage and add users to Office 365 and use DirSync to make your administration duties easier and safer. It will also teach you about the two-main type of identity within Office 365, the requirements for running the Office suite, and what it can provide for your small business.

courseDescription:
This course begins with a detailed discussion of what Office 365 is and what it can do for your business. You will learn that Office 365 is a line of subscription services that provides plans including access to Microsoft Office applications plus other productivity services that are enabled over the Internet. You will study the features and requirements of Office 365, learn what a Microsoft partner is, and look into the PowerShell capabilities for Office 365 Administration.

You will then learn that to add or change a domain in office 365, you have to log on to your account on Office 365 admin centre and navigate to the Domains section in the admin portal. You will look into the different administration roles available in office 365, the process of adding a managing user in both the office 365 GUI and in PowerShell, the three option for adding/managing users in Office 365, and more.

Office 365 is designed to help you pursue your passion and grow your business using integrated apps and services. Upon the completion of this course, you will gain better insight into the features, requirements, and administration roles available in Office 365, the different types of identities in the office 365 environment among others. Sign up for this course and start learning more about administering Office 365 to conduct business processes more efficiently and effectively.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module you will be introduced to Office 365, you will learn what Office 365 is and provides to you. You will learn about the features Office 365 can provide your business. You will learn about the requirements for running and using Office 365. You will learn about PowerShell what it is and how it can be used for administrating Office 365. You will learn what a Microsoft partner is and how to become one.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module you will be introduced to user management in Office 365. You will learn about adding a new domain to office 365 and how to add a user to that domain. You will learn about identities, namely the two-main type of identities cloud and federated. You will learn about adding and managing users, with the office 365 admin centre and PowerShell. You will learn about the different administration roles that can be assigned in Office 365.
topics: Adding a New Domain to Office 365
Adding and Managing Users and Groups

modules.description: In this module you will be introduced to DirSync. You will learn more about identities in office 365. You will learn about what DirSync is and how it works. You will learn about requirements need to use and run DirSync. You will learn about using Windows server 2012 R2 for same-sign on and you will learn about using single sign-on.
